item.title: Need java help
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Ok main reason for htis post:

  1. TO bump my post count up to 500 lol jk
  2. real reason is i need help with my java server.

Sorry if this isnt right section.

Ok i want to add a sort of pm, but idk how to set up a command so that it sends a message from one user to another. The best thing i can think of is the void that is used to kick users. here is the command for kick, can any one help?

	{
		boolean exists = false;
		
		if(!is_admin())		// Only Admin can kick
			return;
		
		if(cmd.length != 2) {
			cliprint("Wrong parameter count. See \\help for details." + VT100.crlf);
			return;
		}
		
		for(Enumeration e = cliinfo.elements(); e.hasMoreElements();) {
			cli_info nn = (cli_info) e.nextElement();
			if(nn.nickname.equals(cmd[1]))
				exists = true;
		}
		
		if(!exists) {
			cliprint("User does not exist." + VT100.crlf);
			return;
		}
		
		if(cmd[1].equals(ms.admin_name))	// Can´t kick admin
			return;
		
		disp.kick_receiver(cmd[1]);

		dispatch2all(VT100.inverse + "User '"+cmd[1]+"' got KICKED"+VT100.normal+VT100.crlf);

		return;
	}

Thats the handler for kicking, closes i can think to affect other users.

Read full topic
